thread.title: The New York Times - 36 Hours in Rio
thread.title_full: The New York Times - 36 Hours in Rio

title: The New York Times - 36 Hours in Rio
text:
> Travel The New York Times - 36 Hours in Rio From The New York Times: Rio has a new cosmopolitan edge, with a reinvigorated downtown, recently opened museums and a diverse cuisine that ranges from Amazonian to old-school European. By: By FRITZIE iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team! Upload your videos and photos and share with the entire WHIO-TV community!
